mapper.select: SELECT SUBMAP_CL_ID AS "id", SUBMAP_CL_NM AS "name", SUBMAP_CL_ORDR AS "seq" FROM TN_SUBMAP_CL WHERE SUBMAP_CL_NM = '기본도'
SELECT SUBMAP_ID AS "id", SUBMAP_NM AS "name", SUBMAP_CL_ID AS "group" , SUBMAP_ORDR AS "seq" FROM TN_SUBMAP WHERE SUBMAP_NM = '기본도'

SELECT a.G2_ID AS "id", a.G2_NAME AS "name", a.G2_MAPID "mapId" FROM G2V_LAYER a right outer join tn_lyr_info b on a.g2_id = b.g2_id WHERE a.G2_BASEID = -1 AND a.G2_MAPID = (SELECT g2vlayer.G2_MAPID FROM TN_LYR_INFO tnlyrinfo,G2V_LAYER g2vlayer WHERE g2vlayer.G2_ID = tnlyrinfo.G2_ID LIMIT 1) ORDER BY b.lyr_order
SELECT GROUP_ID AS "id", GROUP_NAME AS "name", USER_ID "mapId" FROM TN_USER_LAYERGROUP WHERE USER_ID ='COMMON' ORDER BY GROUP_ID

SELECT tnlyrinfo.MAP_ID as "tmapid", g2vlayer.GROUP_ID as "layerGroup", g2vlayer.GROUP_NAME AS "groupName", tnlyrinfo.LYR_ID AS "id", tnlyrinfo.LYR_ENG_NM AS "table", tnlyrinfo.LYR_KOREAN_NM AS "theme", tnlyrinfo.LYR_KOREAN_NM AS "alias", tnlyrinfo.LYR_ORDER AS "seq", tnlyrinfo.LYR_ONOFF as "show", tnlyrinfo.LYR_TYPE as "layerType" FROM TN_LYR_INFO tnlyrinfo INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.G2_BASEID AS GROUP_ID, A.G2_NAME AS GROUP_NAME, B.G2_ID AS LAYER_ID, B.G2_NAME AS LAYER_NAME, B.G2_DEFINE FROM (SELECT * FROM G2V_LAYER WHERE G2_BASEID = -1) A INNER JOIN G2V_LAYER B ON (A.G2_ID = B.G2_BASEID) ORDER BY A.G2_ORDER, B.G2_ORDER ) g2vlayer ON (tnlyrinfo.G2_ID = g2vlayer.LAYER_ID)
ORDER BY tnlyrinfo.LYR_ORDER ASC
